Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in pterodactyl/panel.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 0.7.19, all versions starting from 1.0.0-rc.0 up to 1.0.0-rc.6
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 0.7.19 before 1.0.0-rc.0, all versions after 1.0.0-rc.6
Solution: Upgrade to versions 0.7.19, 1.0.0-rc.7 or above. *Note*: 1.0.0-rc.7 may be an unstable version. Use caution.
